1.5.1.name: wordpress/jp-listinstalledplugins
1.5.1.description: Lists your currently installed and activated plugins. Plugins can be hidden form the list if desired. Options page allows you to set a page to display the list on, change the format, and configure other options. The plugin also features a customizable widget to display your plugins. The plugin is multi-lingual ready with much text already being translated using built in strings. To summarize; this plugin features as many customizations as you could possibly want for something seemingly so simple.
